DOC.brief_summary: Participants recruit screened ongoing study sleep anxiety disorder clinic . Participants insomnia consent complete several questionnaire , undergo brief physical exam , provide urinalysis , undergo 5 night active sham Low Field Magnetic Stimulation ( LFMS ) follow overnight sleep study . Each two treatment condition ( active versus sham ) conduct two consecutive night . There 7 day adaptation night first treatment condition 7 night two-night treatment condition . Thus , participant completes full study spend total 5 night sleep laboratory time interval first adaptation night completion study may range 5-19 day particular individual .
DOC.brief_title: Study Low Field Magnetic Stimulation ( LFMS ) Measures Sleep
DOC.criteria: Insomnia diagnosis per DSM5 criterion Performing task timely manner ( compare person 's usual level performance ) Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Index ( PSQI ) > 6 one following : Sleep Efficiency < 85 % ( per Consensus Sleep Diary ) Insomnia Severity Index ( ISI ) score > 15 Sleep latency ( subjective ) and/or time awake sleep onset ( subjective ) > 30 minute . Not currently depress ( previous major depressive episode current antidepressant medication permit long remission current medication dosage stable â‰¥ 1 month ) . Willing refrain alcohol twentyfour hour present sleep lab sleep study BMI > 18 < 50 kg/m2 Current major depressive episode Current substanceinduced depressive disorder Selfreported use benzodiazepine hypnotic drug last two week Selfreported use marijuana previous 72 hour Alcohol Use Disorders Identification Test ( AUDIT ) score > 10 Fagerstrom Test Nicotine Dependence ( FTND ) score > 4 Insomnia limit early morning awakening ( without difficulty initiate maintain sleep ) , Narcolepsy Seizure Disorder ( include childhood febrile seizure ) Recent treatment anticonvulsant medication Obstructive central sleep apnea Circadian rhythm sleepwake disorder Recurrent isolate sleep paralysis Current substanceinduced insomnia Chronic pain disorder Daily Caffeine Consumption > 500 mg/d ( Uhde , 1989 ) Restless legs syndrome Periodic Leg Movement Disorder Benzodiazepines antipsychotic medication past 30 day Presence drug abuse ( exclude marijuana , urinalysis ) Pregnancy plan become pregnant History severe allergic reaction adhesive tape History neurological disorder Conductive , ferromagnetic magneticsensitive metal head , neck , chest , upper arm , area within 18 inch treatment coil .
